title: Midnight Angel
description: A noblewoman of frail beauty and exotic mystery fakes her own death to escape the gallows. And now she must flee. In disguise and under a false identity, she finds unexpected sanctuary in the arms of a handsome and arrogant yet gallant British lordâ€”who must defy society to keep her safe . . . and overcome a tragic past to claim her as his own.
author: Lisa Kleypas
